title: RPG Character System - ES6 Class Syntax
description: Convert constructor functions to modern ES6 class syntax. Learn how classes work, class syntax fundamentals, and the relationship between classes and constructors.

concepts.class_syntax: Modern ES6+ syntax for defining classes and creating objects
concepts.class_constructor: Special method that runs when creating new instances
concepts.instance_properties: Properties unique to each instance created from the class
concepts.class_vs_constructor: ES6 classes are syntactic sugar over constructor functions

learning_outcomes: Understand ES6 class syntax and its relationship to constructors
Create specialized classes for different character types
Compare constructor functions vs class syntax
